trans-unit.source: This class represents the application security trust information.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別表示應用程式安全性信任資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo" /> object to its default state of full trust.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo" /> 物件重設為其完全信任的預設狀態。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the application has permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 決定應用程式是否有權呼叫未受管理的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the application has permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 指出應用程式是否有權呼叫未受管理程式碼的布林值。

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read.
trans-unit.target: 「 應用程式 」 是指應用程式正在讀取資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: You can read the deployment manifest using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讀取部署資訊清單使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the application is full trust or partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 判斷應用程式是完全信任還是部分信任。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the application is full trust or partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，表示應用程式是完全信任還是部分信任。

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read.
trans-unit.target: 「 應用程式 」 是指應用程式正在讀取資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: You can read the deployment manifest using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讀取部署資訊清單使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permission set object for the application trust.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式信任的權限集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.PermissionSet" /> object for the application trust.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式信任的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.PermissionSet" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to preserve partial trust permission when the full trust flag is set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在設定完全信任旗標時是否保留部分信任權限。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether to preserve partial trust permission when the full trust flag is set.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，表示在設定完全信任旗標時是否保留部分信任權限。

trans-unit.source: Normally when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A> is set to `True`, all permission settings are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 通常當<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A>設`True`，所有的權限設定會被刪除。

trans-unit.source: If you want to preserve these settings (typically during design time), you can call this method to persist the permission settings even when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A> is set to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要保留這些設定 （通常在設計階段），您可以呼叫這個方法，將權限設定，即使<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A>設`True`。

trans-unit.source: `PreserveFullTrustPermissionSet` should not be set to `True` for ClickOnce deployments because this violates ClickOnce schema requirements.
trans-unit.target: `PreserveFullTrustPermissionSet` 不應設為`True`ClickOnce 部署因為這樣會違反 ClickOnce 結構描述的需求。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `False` with full trust specified, then any permissions defined in the permission set object will be dropped on save.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`False`指定完全信任，然後定義的權限中任何權限集合物件皆會予以捨棄儲存。

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 從 XML 檔案中讀取應用程式信任。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: 指定輸入資料流。

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 從 XML 檔案中讀取應用程式信任。

trans-unit.source: The data stream must contain only a \<TrustInfo> section and no other data.
trans-unit.target: 資料流必須只包含\<TrustInfo > 一節和任何其他資料。

trans-unit.source: The name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: 輸入檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 從 XML 檔案中讀取應用程式信任。

trans-unit.source: The specified string must contain only a \<TrustInfo> section and no other data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字串必須只包含\<TrustInfo > 一節和任何其他資料。

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 從 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單讀取應用程式信任。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: 指定輸入資料流。

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 從 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單讀取應用程式信任。

trans-unit.source: The name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: 輸入檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 從 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單讀取應用程式信任。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of same site access permitted, specifying whether the application has permission to communicate with the server from which it was deployed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相同網站存取權允許的層級，指定應用程式是否有與部署該應用程式之伺服器通訊的權限。

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the level of same site access permitted.
trans-unit.target: 表示所允許相同網站存取權層級的字串。

trans-unit.source: The values can be <see langword="site" /> or <see langword="none" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="site" /> 或 <see langword="none" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="site" /> specifies that the application can call Web services at the same URL from which it was deployed; if deployed from a share, the application has permission to read files from that share.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="site" />，表示應用程式可以在其部署來源的相同 URL 上呼叫 Web 服務；如果部署來源屬於共用，應用程式會擁有該共用內檔案的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="none" /> specifies that the application can neither access Web services from the same URL from which it was deployed, nor access files from the share from which it was deployed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="none" />，表示應用程式不能從其部署來源的相同 URL 上存取 Web 服務，也不能讀取其部署來源之共用內的檔案。

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read (using <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest(System.IO.Stream)" />).
trans-unit.target: 「應用程式」指的是為其讀取資訊清單的應用程式 (使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest(System.IO.Stream)" />)。

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read.
trans-unit.target: 「 應用程式 」 是指應用程式正在讀取資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: You can read the deployment manifest using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讀取部署資訊清單使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the information in the application security trust object as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字串傳回應用程式安全性信任物件中所有資訊。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the information in the application security trust object.
trans-unit.target: 包含應用程式安全性信任物件中所有資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式信任寫入 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an output stream.
trans-unit.target: 指定輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式信任寫入 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the \<TrustInfo> section and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會更新\<TrustInfo > 只包含檔案中的區段\<TrustInfo > 區段，而無其他內容。

trans-unit.source: The specified stream must contain only a \<TrustInfo> section and no other data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料流必須只包含\<TrustInfo > 一節和任何其他資料。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 輸出檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式信任寫入 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the \<TrustInfo> section and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會更新\<TrustInfo > 只包含檔案中的區段\<TrustInfo > 區段，而無其他內容。

trans-unit.source: The specified string must contain only a \<TrustInfo> section and no other data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字串必須只包含\<TrustInfo > 一節和任何其他資料。

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to a new template ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式信任寫入新範本 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an output stream to which to write the updated manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其中寫入所更新資訊清單檔的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to a new template ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式信任寫入新範本 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \<TrustInfo> section, and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會更新\<TrustInfo > 一節中的檔案包含只有最上層資訊清單標頭， \<TrustInfo > 區段中，而無其他內容。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 輸出檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式信任寫入 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \<TrustInfo> section, and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會更新\<TrustInfo > 一節中的檔案包含只有最上層資訊清單標頭， \<TrustInfo > 區段中，而無其他內容。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method will update the file in place (that is, the input file is the same as the output file).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法多載，將更新就地檔案 （也就是在輸入的檔是相同的輸出檔案）。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists, the trust section will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案存在，將會更新信任區段。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, a new template manifest with the specified trust will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，就會建立新的範本資訊清單，使用指定的信任。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream containing the manifest to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含要更新之資訊清單的輸入資料流。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an output stream to which to write the updated manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其中寫入所更新資訊清單檔的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Updates an existing ClickOnce application manifest with the specified trust.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的信任，更新現有的 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \<TrustInfo> section, and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會更新\<TrustInfo > 一節中的檔案包含只有最上層資訊清單標頭， \<TrustInfo > 區段中，而無其他內容。
